## Model Type
(choose)
- Biomass – National (spatial unit as RE)
- Biomass – Spatial unit-specific
- Volume – National (spatial unit as RE)
- Volume – Spatial unit-specific

## Species group
- species-specific
- conifer/broadleaf
- generic (species-independent)
